hero.title: I am Marcus
hero.subtitle: And I am a software developer!

about.p1: I am a seasoned software developer with over 15 years of experience, well-versed in the entire product development lifecycle, from concept to launch.
about.p2: I am passionate about writing clean code, adhering to SOLID principles, and practicing Test-Driven Development (TDD)
about.p3: My expertise spans a variety of technologies, including .NET Core, Java, Node.js, Typescript, GraphQL, Angular (4+), React, and vanilla JavaScript
about.p4: Additionally, I have experience as a technical leader, guiding architectural decisions, delegating tasks, and fostering knowledge-sharing within development teams.

item1.title: Who am I?
item1.p1: I come from the vibrant city of SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil, where I was born and raised.
item1.p2: I am a proud father of three wonderful children, a devoted husband, and a dedicated enthusiast of music and drumming in my spare time.
item1.p3: Beyond my deep-seated passion for programming and technology, I have an insatiable curiosity for the wonders of science and the mysteries of the cosmos, especially in the field of astronomy. Each day, I strive to expand my knowledge by embracing the opportunity to learn something new.

item2.title: What are my hobbies
item2.p1: During my leisure hours, I indulge in playing video games, with a particular fondness for Nintendo, especially the "Legend of Zelda" franchise.
item2.p2: Music holds a special place as my second passion. Drumming and savoring the sounds of various genres, including progressive rock, hard rock, heavy metal, Brazilian music, jazz, and fusion, are pursuits I thoroughly enjoy.
